original_text: And it was so, as she rode on the ass, that she came down by the covert on the hill, and, behold, David and his men came down against her; and she met them.
korean_text: 아비가일이 나귀를 타고 산 호젓한 곳을 따라 내려가더니 다윗과 그의 사람들이 자기에게로 내려오는 그들과 마주치니라

sentences.original_text: as she rode on the ass
that she came down by the covert on the hill
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 언덕의 은밀한 곳을 통해 내려왔다

sentences.original_text: David and his men came down against her
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들이 그녀를 맞아 내려왔다
